resources.string:
Pay careful attention to each card because you can only see them once. 
 At the bottom of each card will be a 'yes' or 'no'.
 If there is a 'Yes' on the card, that means that the computers number is on that card
 If there is a 'No' on the card, that means that the computers number is not on that card.

Choose a number within the range and remember it in your head.
 Click the play button to start the game.
 Once the game the has started click the 'Yes' button if you see your number on the card.
 Once you have made all the selections the computer will try to guess your number!

Free play does not give you any points towards your highscores.\n It doesn\'t give you any \'Yes\' or \'No\' prompts.\n It just allows you to play with your friends, by browsing freely through the cards
